My fraternity helps me socialize and let off steam. I try to have the new CSSE members come to ICPC with me.

paragraphs.paragraph: I'm building solutions for graduate students pursuing their dissertations.
For my most recent project I used vision to detect skin conditions. I webscraped a dataset and manual cleaned it, then diluted a public model (EffcientNet) to score our results.
I also developed a therapy mobile app to experiment with generative AI in the realm of human psychology (full stack development).

I had a traumatic head injury (from a charity boxing match) that humilated an invincibility complex I built up. This led me to write profusely about life, death, purpose... a conversation I needed to have with myself. I hope to publish my book by the time I graduate college, but it doesn't matter if no one reads it. It matters to me that I wrote it.
